(A) Institute of Forest Genetics and Tree Breeding
(D) Academy of Scientific and Innovative Research

(A) National Council for Science & Technology Communication
(C) Council of Scientific and Industrial Research

Q.12. Which startup has launched an antimicrobial and washable face mask that can be reused up to 50 launderings?
